statements: SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT shareholder_id, voting_rights FROM tokenized_assets WHERE voting_rights = TRUE;
SELECT asset_name, token_balance FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%token%';
SELECT asset_name, token_balance FROM tokenized_assets WHERE voting_rights = TRUE ORDER BY token_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets WHERE shareholder_id = 1000;
SELECT asset_name, token_balance FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_id < 10 ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, shareholder_id, token_balance FROM tokenized_assets WHERE token_balance BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT MAX(token_balance) AS max_token_balance, MIN(token_balance) AS min_token_balance FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, token_type FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shareholder_votes WHERE shareholder_id = 1001 ORDER BY vote_timestamp ASC;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(asset_id) AS asset_count FROM tokenized_assets GROUP BY asset_type;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock'
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Bond' ORDER BY asset_id DESC

SELECT asset_id, asset_name, MAX(vote_timestamp) AS latest_vote_timestamp FROM tokenized_assets LEFT JOIN shareholder_votes ON tokenized_assets.asset_id = shareholder_votes.asset_id GROUP BY asset_id, asset_name
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_id IN (SELECT asset_id FROM shareholder_votes WHERE vote_choice = TRUE)

SELECT asset_name, COUNT(shareholder_id) AS total_votes FROM tokenized_assets LEFT JOIN shareholder_votes ON tokenized_assets.asset_id = shareholder_votes.asset_id GROUP BY asset_name HAVING total_votes > 1 ORDER BY total_votes DESC
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT asset_name, token_price FROM tokenized_assets WHERE token_price > 1000;
SELECT shareholder_name, token_balance FROM shareholders ORDER BY token_balance DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, asset_name, decision FROM shareholders JOIN votes ON shareholders.shareholder_id = votes.shareholder_id JOIN tokenized_assets ON votes.asset_id = tokenized_assets.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE decision = 'approve';
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT asset_name, token_price FROM tokenized_assets ORDER BY token_price DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, token_price FROM tokenized_assets WHERE token_price > 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, token_price FROM tokenized_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY asset_name;
SELECT ta.asset_id, ta.asset_name, sh.shareholder_name, v.decision FROM tokenized_assets ta JOIN votes v ON ta.asset_id = v.asset_id JOIN shareholders sh ON sh.shareholder_id = v.shareholder_id;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets;
SELECT asset_name, total_tokens FROM tokenized_assets ORDER BY total_tokens DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders WHERE shareholder_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT asset_name, total_tokens, asset_id FROM tokenized_assets WHERE total_tokens > 1000;
SELECT voting_id, shareholder_id, asset_id FROM voting_rights WHERE voting_power >= 50;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT asset_name, total_tokens FROM tokenized_assets WHERE total_tokens > 1000;
SELECT s.shareholder_name, v.vote_choice FROM shareholders s JOIN voting_rights vr ON s.shareholder_id = vr.shareholder_id JOIN shareholder_votes v ON vr.voting_id = v.voting_id;
SELECT * FROM voting_rights WHERE voting_power > 50 ORDER BY voting_power DESC, asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, total_tokens, token_price FROM tokenized_assets WHERE total_tokens > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, token_price FROM tokenized_assets WHERE token_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders ORDER BY shareholder_name DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, voting_power FROM shareholders JOIN voting_rights ON shareholders.shareholder_id = voting_rights.shareholder_id WHERE voting_power > 1;
SELECT * FROM tokenized_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, total_tokens FROM tokenized_assets WHERE total_tokens > 1000;
SELECT shareholder_name, email FROM shareholders WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT shareholder_name, asset_name, voting_power FROM shareholders AS s JOIN voting_rights AS v ON s.shareholder_id = v.shareholder_id;
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE vote_decision = true AND shareholder_id = 'e2e4d60e-4561-4059-a4e8-1d1e6f8b615c';
